meta.description: Your Zendesk account for managing customer support tickets, knowledge base, and communication channels.

options.label: Addresses
options.description: Manage business addresses required for phone number verification and regulatory compliance in specific countries.

options.label: Greetings
options.description: Create and manage custom voice greetings for phone lines, voicemail systems, and IVR menus to enhance caller experience.

options.label: Greeting Categories
options.description: Organize greeting types by purpose including voicemail, hold music, callback confirmations, and call recording consent messages.

options.label: IVR
options.description: Configure Interactive Voice Response systems that provide automated phone menu interactions and intelligent call routing for callers.

options.label: IVR Menus
options.description: Design individual menu items and navigation options within IVR systems to create seamless caller journey experiences.

options.label: IVR Routes
options.description: Define call routing paths and destination actions based on caller selections, including group routing, transfers, and voicemail options.

options.label: Callback Requests
options.description: Handle customer callback requests when agents are unavailable or queues are full to improve service quality and reduce wait times.

options.label: Lines
options.description: Manage agent forwarding numbers and availability settings to enable flexible call distribution and remote work capabilities.

options.label: Phone Numbers
options.description: Purchase, configure, and manage phone numbers for your voice channels including toll-free numbers and local lines with various capabilities.

meta.description: Select the resource you want to work with.
